content.raw:
Using Darpa RNDF file example, I've found some issues parsing the zone 14 part of the file. To make it pass, removal of the zone 14 and linked waypoints was necessary. Execution ends with gazebo::common:exception.

The original file can be found [here](https://github.com/ekumenlabs/terminus/blob/master/samples/rndf/darpa.rndf).

The file modified to be parsed can be found [here](https://bitbucket.org/agalbachicar/rndf_gazebo_plugin/src/27c0fc290d95e15e36f0971df256220c378697e0/example/darpa.rndf?at=Issue%2F%2315_Change_waypoint_shape&fileviewer=file-view-default).

The error message thrown is the following:


```
#!bash

--File path: ../../src/samples/rndf/darpa.rndf
--Print waypoints: 1
--Print lanes: 1
[Line 329]: Unable to parse segment header element
 "segment_name  Nebraska_St     /*parking lot entrance road*/   "
[Err] [rndf_gazebo_plugin.cc:100] EXCEPTION: File [../../src/samples/rndf/darpa.rndf] is invalid

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'gazebo::common::Exception'
Aborted (core dumped)
```

After removing the comment:


```
#!bash

--File path: ../../src/samples/rndf/darpa2.rndf
--Print waypoints: 1
--Print lanes: 1
[Line 400]: Unable to parse spot header element.
 "spot_width    16              "
[Err] [rndf_gazebo_plugin.cc:100] EXCEPTION: File [../../src/samples/rndf/darpa2.rndf] is invalid

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'gazebo::common::Exception'
Aborted (core dumped)
```
content.html:
Using Darpa RNDF file example, I've found some issues parsing the zone 14 part of the file. To make it pass, removal of the zone 14 and linked waypoints was necessary. Execution ends with gazebo::common:exception.

The original file can be found here.

The file modified to be parsed can be found here.

The error message thrown is the following:

--File path: ../../src/samples/rndf/darpa.rndf
--Print waypoints: 1
--Print lanes: 1
[Line 329]: Unable to parse segment header element
 "segment_name  Nebraska_St     /*parking lot entrance road*/   "
[Err] [rndf_gazebo_plugin.cc:100] EXCEPTION: File [../../src/samples/rndf/darpa.rndf] is invalid

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'gazebo::common::Exception'
Aborted (core dumped)

After removing the comment:

--File path: ../../src/samples/rndf/darpa2.rndf
--Print waypoints: 1
--Print lanes: 1
[Line 400]: Unable to parse spot header element.
 "spot_width    16              "
[Err] [rndf_gazebo_plugin.cc:100] EXCEPTION: File [../../src/samples/rndf/darpa2.rndf] is invalid

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'gazebo::common::Exception'
Aborted (core dumped)
